text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Track & Field and Cross Country College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Oversee the entire Track & Field and Cross Country organization by supervising, developing and mentoring staff. Coach, develop and mentor student-athletes to their fullest potential through...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
